Sentencas: Lignite, also known as brown coal, and char derived from lignite by pyrolysis were investigated as fuels for direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFC).
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: Experiments were carried out with 16 cm(2) active area, electrolyte supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), using pulverized solid fuel directly fed to DC-SOFC anode compartment in a batch mode, fixed bed configuration.
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: The maximum power density of 143 mW/cm(2) was observed with a char derived from lignite, much higher than 93 mW/cm(2) when operating on a lignite fuel.
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: The cell was operating under electric load until fuel supply was almost completely exhausted.
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: Reloading fixed lignite bed during a thermal cycle resulted in a similar initial cell performance, pointing to feasibility of fuel cell operation in a continuous fuel supply mode.
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: The additional series of experiments were carried out in SOFC cell, in the absence of solid fuels, with (a) simulated CO/CO2 gas mixtures in a wide range of compositions and (b) humidified hydrogen as a reference fuel composition for all cases considered.
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell, operated with 92%CO + 8%CO2 gas mixture, generated the maximum power density of 342 mW/cm(2).
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system

Sentencas: The fuel cell performance has increased in the following order: lignite (DC-SOFC) < char derived from lignite (DC-SOFC) < CO + CO2 gas mixture (SOFC) <
Titulo: Lignite as a fuel for direct carbon fuel cell system
